embeds.title: **⊱ ────── { Bots**
embeds.description: At Webtoon Hangout, we have a variety of bots for you to enjoy!

fields.name: > Arcane
fields.value:
Prefix: `!`
What it does: We use Arcane for leveling.
Helpful commands: `!level` `!leaderboard`

fields.name: > Carl-bot
fields.value:
Prefix: `?`
What it does: We use Carl-bot for moderation

fields.name: > Plasma
fields.value:
Prefix: `.`
What it does: We use Plasma to track invites (who invited who)

fields.name: > YAGPDB.xyz
fields.value:
Prefix: `@`
What it does: Yagpdb is an all-purpose bot. We use it for test requests, tickets, webtoon statuses, and more. 
Helpful commands: `@request` `@status`

fields.name: > Statbot
fields.value:
Prefix: `s?`
What it does: We use statbot for member counts, goals, and others

fields.name: > Disboard
fields.value:
Prefix: `d!`
`!d bump` to bump our server!

fields.name: > DiscordServers
fields.value:
Prefix: `|`
`|bump` to bump our server!

fields.name: > DSL
fields.value: Prefix: None

fields.name: > Anigame
fields.value:
Prefix: `.`
What it does: AniGame is an enjoyable game that lets you collect unique anime cards and battle on floors and locations. 
Helpful Commands: `.start` `.basics` `.claim [card number]` `.stam` `.battle` `.location` `.floor`

fields.name: > Dank Memer
fields.value:
Prefix: `pls`
What it does: Dank Memer is a currency bot that you can play with.
Helpful Commands: `pls work` `pls search` `pls deposit all` `pls hourly` `pls daily` `pls beg`

fields.name: > Epic RPG
fields.value:
Prefix: `rpg`
What it does: Epic RPG allows you to level up and collect materials. Then, you can try to beat dungeon bosses to unlock new commands and features.
Helpful Commands: `rpg start` `rpg help` `rpg hunt` `rpg adventure`

fields.name: > MarriageBot
fields.value:
Prefix: `m.`
What it does: MarriageBot allows two users to get married and create a wonderful family together. 
Helpful Commands: `m.tree` `m.adopt <@user>` `m.disown <@user>` `m.divorce < @user>` `m.runaway` `m.partner` `m.children`

fields.name: > Mudae
fields.value:
Prefix: `$`
What it does: Mudae lets users claim and customize anime, manga, comics, and video game characters to add to your harem. It also includes Pokémon to catch. 
Helpful Commands: `$pokemon` `$pokedex` `$waifu` `$husbando` `$marry` `$wg` `$wa`

fields.name: > Nekobot
fields.value:
Prefix: `n!`
What it does: NekoBoth has many entertaining activities to try, moderation, and utility commands.      
Helpful Commands: `n!register` `n!profile` `n!divorce <@user>` `n!marry <@user>` `n!daily`

fields.name: > OwO
fields.value:
Prefix:` OwO`
What it does: OwO's primary commands are the ones regarding animals, which you can hunt down, sell, sacrifice, and battle against others! OwO also has many emotes and actions you can do!
Helpful Commands: `OwO daily` `OwO quest` `OwO shop` `OwO buy` `OwO hunt` `OwO battle` `OwO inventory` `OwO translate`

fields.name: > UNO
fields.value:
Prefix: `uno`
What it does: The Uno bot lets you and your friends play Uno within text-channels. It's usually used for game nights.
Helpful Commands: `uno rules` `uno!` `uno join` `uno quit` `uno start` `uno play <color> <value>` `uno pickup` `uno callout`

fields.name: > Hydra
fields.value:
Prefix: `^`
What it does: Hydra lets you put in your very own music to listen to and saves it all into a playlist.
Helpful Commands: `^play <song name>` `^search` `^skip` `^pause` `^queue` `^lyrics`

fields.name: > Octave
fields.value:
Prefix: `o*`
What it does: Octave is a bot that plays music and can queue any song you’d like. All your songs will be put into a playlist for you to vibe to.
Helpful Commands: `o*play <song name>` `o*pause` `o*nowplaying` `o*clearqueue` `o*lyrics`

fields.name: > Rythm
fields.value:
Prefix: `!`
What it does: Rythm plays any song there is out there. (No NSFW songs will be allowed here though.) Rythm lets you listen to music with others or by yourself. 
Helpful Commands: `!play <song name>` `!pause` `!queue` `!np` `!leave` `!lyrics` `!skip`

fields.name: > Groovy
fields.value:
Prefix: `-`
Groovy is a music bot that plays music in high-quality and can play any song you choose.
Helpful Commands: `-join` `-play <song name>` `-skip` `-queue` `-pause` `-leave`

fields.name: > Birthday Bot
fields.value:
Prefix: `bday`
What it does: It sets your birthday, and helps you celebrate it with an announcement and a role
Helpful Commands: `bday set`

fields.name: > Dyno
fields.value:
Prefix: `_`
What it does: It helps with staff commands and also can set AFKs.
Helpful Commands: `_afk <reason>`

fields.name: > Giveaway Bot
fields.value:
Prefix: `!g`
What it does: Hosts giveaways
Helpful commands: `!gstart <days/hours/min> <winners> <prize>`
